name: ESCAPE SIN CITY
description:
Definitely the best game you will ever play. Probably ever.

Yup. Absolutely. I have no reservations about that.

Arrow keys or joystick to move, x, X or RT to hoot- I mean shoot. 

Press down to do a DuckTales/shovel knight down jab and bounce off enemies.

(Traditional XBOX controllers supported.)

There's a .ZIP file, not an installer cuz i'm a NICE GUY.
